org.openorb.compiler.generator
Class IdlToJava

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.openorb.compiler.generator.IdlToJava
public class IdlToJava
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates all mapping for IDL descriptions.

Author:
Jerome Daniel
